Row.Text: Qin's Wonders Mislead
The First Emperor's decree accelerates wonder construction through relentless labor mobilization.

Wonder Production+40%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION],Settlement Limit +3：Stacked with the Age,All cities +5 Production[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION];+4 Happiness[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] from Wonders in all your cities.
Isabella’s Treasury
Join Isabella in the Fantasy Civilization and explore the unknown treasury.
Gain +300 gold[icon:YIELD_GOLD] whenever you discover a natural wonder,Natural wonders +100% tile output,Pathfinder +3 Vision,Natural Wonders +2 Gold[icon:YIELD_GOLD]
King’s Seal
Exquisitely crafted to depict the image of a great king.

Special Buildings and Improvement: +3 Gold[icon:YIELD_GOLD] and Culture[icon:YIELD_CULTURE], And +1 Food[icon:YIELD_FOOD]/Science[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE]/Happiness[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS]/Production[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION].+ 1 Military/Economic/Political/Expansionist/Scientific/Cultural Attribute.
+3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold on Unique Buildings and Improvements.

Replace.Text: +100% yields on Natural Wonders, if you are working the most Natural Wonder tiles.[n]+2 Combat Strength for Naval Units if you are not.

Row.Text: Art of War
Know yourself and know your enemy, and you will never be defeated.

1.All Units +1 Movement During wars; 2.Command Units + 30% exp; 3.Units +3 Combat in Neutral or enemy Territory; 4.+ 100 Culture[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] and Gold[icon:YIELD_GOLD] upon first occupying a settlement, stacking by Age; 5.All settlements +20% Gold[icon:YIELD_GOLD]; 6.Settlement Limit +3：Stacked with the Age; 7.Razed a City will + 1 point of war support, Stack with the number of cities Razed, capped at 30 points.
Xiang Yu’s Conflagration
A single torch of the Chu, alas, leaving only scorched earth.
Razed a City will + 1 point of war support, Stack with the number of cities Razed, capped at 30 points.
The Prosperous Era of the Tang Dynasty
The Prosperous Era of the Tang Dynasty, where all nations come to pay tribute, and culture flourishes.

Gain +200 influence as suzerain of city-states and +20% influence; at 5 settlements +1 influence for tech and culture; at 10 settlements, +3 influence, stacking with the age; settlement cap +5, stacking with the age.
Silk Road
Ancient trade and cultural exchange route linking East and West

All trade routes +10 range; +3 trade routes cap with other leaders; Each trade route +2 Gold[icon:YIELD_GOLD] and +2 Culture[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] :stacking with the age,If you have the most trade routes, the effect is doubled.; All cities +3 resource capacity; Unlocks Wonder purchases during Golden Ages
Add Memento
No need to unlock
